name: Académie des sciences
legal: Personne morale de droit public à statut particulier
bossPosition: Secrétaire perpétuel de l'Académie des sciences
goal:
Encourager la vie scientifique
Promouvoir l'enseignement des sciences
Transmettre les connaissances
Favoriser les collaborations internationales
Assurer un rôle d'expertise et de conseil
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation, Youth

ERC
Horizon 2020
Open science open access initiative
